additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: CAUTIONThe PH level of this product is specifically formulated for use on dogs only. Avoid getting in eyes or ears (human & canine). Keep out of reach of children. Always check your dog carefully, if they have any adverse reaction, discontinue use.

description: What's insideActive ingredients enriched with a blend of Cherry Blossom, Vanilla and Aloe vera to nourish and moisturise your pet's coat. With added natural silk proteins to help condition.
name: Earth Dog 2 In 1 Cherry Blossom Vanilla & Aloe Vera All Natural Conditioning Shampoo
